website_summaries.verdict: Panasonic's excellent KX-TG7400 series of DECT 6.0 cordless phones one-ups the company's highly rated 6400 series with the notable addition of a larger 2.1-inch screen and "Choice Mail" (a form of visual voice mail) to its impressive feature set.
pros: "Choice Mail" Selectable Voice Message (visual voice mail)
cons: Front of phone attracts fingerprints/oil from your face

customer_reviews.title: The best home phone I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a very feature rich phone system. I've owned three different Panasonic phones over the years, and this is by far the cream of the crop. Pros *Dect 6.0 makes setting up your second phone very convenient - No phone line *Very Good reception everywhere in my home *Interface is nice, and very easy to use *Ascetically goes nice with the rest of my electronics *Accessing Voice mail from the handheld *Silent Mode! Turning the ringer off from 11PM to 9AM in my bedroom is great Cons *I haven't came across one so far Overall there are a plethora of options. This is a great phone that you won't regret buying.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Bimler

customer_reviews.title: Look good, perform great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cordless set that I have ever had. Pro's -Good build quality, nice weight. -Buttons have a nice tactile feel to them (I hate those phones that have mushy buttons) -Call quality is good (even in my Condo where there are 5 Wi-fi routers in range) -nice screen -good features Con's -Minor learning curve for some of the extra features, nothing the hand book couldn't solve. (plus easier than most phones) -Wish 'Off' button said 'End' like most cell phones. Overall this is a great phone as I mentioned before. I will probably be adding extra handsets in the future. Seems like this phone was worth the premium paid, Panasonic makes a good product.
customer_reviews.author: P. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this phone, my husband and I think it is fantastic! It has lots of options but the one we most appreciate is the call block feature. It has helped to make our lives a little more hassle free with no telemarketers calling! We also appreciate the larger number display, and the all around ease of navigating the different programs. We are delighted.....excellent quality and excellent price, what more could one ask for?
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone about a month ago. Overall, I am very happy with it and I recommend it. The good - The talking part works well. Great mute and hold feature. Nice big screen. Great integrated answering machine. Has a headset jack. Clear sound. Long range. Call block feature. Could improve - Dials slowly The speaker placement is poor and could be louder. Call log not labeled well. Not clear when was the newest call. More ring tones would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: CYSR

customer_reviews.title: Mighty fine phone
customer_reviews.text: We don't use the answering machine, but the phone performance and ease of use is great. The large screen is easy to read, functions are simple to find and use, and audio quality and volume makes it easy to hear. Voice caller id is helpful and, so far, very reliable. We have two units; when we establish settings on one, they automatically are created on the other. I hope we're a long way from having to replace the batteries, but since they are AA, that task will be a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Don W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and solid features for the money
customer_reviews.text: Needed a basic Dect 6.0 phone and this Panasonic got great reviews. It has 2 units, answering machine and was simple to use right out of the box. -Easy to set up -Good interface - light up keys, strong volume and easy to view and clear messages and missed calls -Good Reception -Spoken Caller ID is a cool feature -Good battery life I like this phone a lot and would recommend it to anyone as a good solid, basic cordless option.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: These are great phones - love them. We have not had a home phone for about 4 years and getting one again was really scary for me but these are great ones. My only complaint about any new phone is the handset design, they just don't seem to ever be "just right" for me but that is a con for all the handsets I have looked at in the stores even.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I am avid user of panasonic phones so my review may be biased. I have been using panasonic products for over 10 years and can testify to their superior quality. This phone is lightweight and keeps its charge. This only really is an issue when the phone has been used for a relatively long time. Its a pretty sophisticated looking phone. If you get it you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dandelion 🌼

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: This phone set looks nice, is relatively easy to use, and has lots of features that we haven't quite figured out yet. Range from the base is adequate for inside our house. We haven't tried taking it outside yet. The only negative is the play-back volume on the answering machine base. To adequately hear the messages, we have to use the handset - which works just fine and has plenty of volume.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wanier

customer_reviews.title: Good call quality, poor range from base.
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. Call quality is fine if you're near enough the base transceiver unit (bigger base unit). Moving away from the base causes calls to become garbled first, then words/phrases drop off before the line goes dead. About 100 feet from base unit through a homes walls is all it takes. Fine phone features and battery life, just the range at issue.
customer_reviews.author: Helium Head

customer_reviews.title: Poor speaker phone
customer_reviews.text: I'm sending it back because I use the speaker phone a lot and this is really unacceptable. Everything is OK... if you are not a big speaker phone user then this phone is a good choice. Battery replacement is cheap because they use standard AA rechargeable and not battery packs that cost a fortune. Battery life is short because they use only two AA. I would have used 3 if I designed it... Bottom line.. the speaker phone is terrible because the other person on the other end is always saying 'What? What?' it gets real annoying after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Scott

customer_reviews.title: Slam Dunk
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this phone is that it works exactly like I expect it too. It makes calls, it has a phone book inside, it takes AA NIMH batteries which are cheap compared to those stupid special telephone batteries that cost $10 each. After owning it for 11 months, I say it was a great purchase. I give it an A+ with a bag of chips.
customer_reviews.author: Jake is Cool

customer_reviews.title: vuanet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit from Amazon, right out of the box, without even reading the manual, instructions are simple by just looking at the on-screen menu, it has good range for a medium-sized house, sound quality is excellent, so is the built quality, kids and I accidentally dropped the handsets a few time on wooden floor:(, still ticking as new:). The answering machine does its function properly without any gimmicks, all in all, I have nothing negative to say about this Panasonic unit, a great buy for the $$!!
customer_reviews.author: vuanet

customer_reviews.title: Many good things about this phone and only one bad
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone with my only issue with it is the phone book menu. I think it's hard to navigate. But that could just be me. Otherwise though, I love the sound quality, the feel of the phone, and pretty much everything else. Bummed that I noticed it was cheaper at [...] as soon as I ordered from Amazon, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Antonino

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These phones: Panasonic Dect 6.0 in Black, Cordless with the Answering Machine... is great.... It gives you different rings...for those you might want to know immediately that it is a person you need to answer immediately... you can also set the alarm on the phone to ring... I really am glad I purchased these phones.... and would recommend them to anyone..
customer_reviews.author: Grandma GG

customer_reviews.title: excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: The Panasonic DECT 6.0 Model KX-TG7432B is exactly what we were looking for. Large easy to read screen, sound quality excellent for 62 year old ears. Easy to set up and talking caller Id is pretty nice. Only 4 stars for battery as have had unit only a couple months and do not know yet battery life, so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R. Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: panasonic phone
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, better than the last phone and the quality is real good. I like the way the phone tells you who is calling without you having to look at the screen. The only thing is the voice should have been a little clearer and not so robotic,but other wards it's a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wignal

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic cordless phone with answering machine
customer_reviews.text: We have found the Panasonic answering machine and phone easy to use. Some of the pronounciations of the voice activated announcements of the caller are a bit strange, but that is not really important. (Can be a bit comical, though!) Overall, we like the phone and answering machine, particulary since it is very compact.
customer_reviews.author: JWF

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, almost indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I dropped one phone from 3rd floor balcony, and it still works! No screen left but phone is clear. That's unbelievable. Good feature is you can block specific phone numbers. Other good features as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jyl

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two months of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone as a gift for someone . The handset's batteries exploded in the phone after two month of use. The hand set phone is dead and it would not even work with new batteries. I paid $75. I can't return it to Amazon because is past 30 days. I'll contact Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Cant say enough good things about this phone, easy to use, great battery life, looks nice, great price, and love the caller id announce feature. i have had this phone for over a year now and love it a few of my friends have also bought this phone and are happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C

customer_reviews.title: We just LOVE these phones
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old panasonic phones that served well for us for more than several years. We love the new phones! Sleek looking. Clear sound. Light weighted. Large, easy-to-read display. Intuitive. And the price is right. Panasonic phones are THE best.
customer_reviews.author: Cucumber Field

customer_reviews.title: panasonic phone
customer_reviews.text: works good big screen don't need glass's to read caller id. hass rechargeable battery's can buy anywhere if needed. has qwirky voice when tells you who's calling with caller id nice feature you can here even if not sitting right next to phone.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Kay

customer_reviews.title: WORKS VERY WELL
customer_reviews.text: THE NAME TELLS IT ALL,i forgot how long i have had this phone it works well and has a lot of ring tones, LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: dtay

customer_reviews.title: Talking Caller ID Makes Life Easier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cordless/answer machine product. I especially like the talking caller ID. You can decide whether to answer the phone without leaving the comfort of your favorite living room chair! The phones are easy to program and the whole setup just takes a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: These phones did not last 3 months and I was very disappointed in them. For the money that I paid for them I would think that they would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Dee

customer_reviews.title: decent phone
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been satisfied with any cordless phones I've bought in the past 2 years (2 of them), I like this one. I've had it a month and everything seems fine. At this point, I recommend it. I like having the 2 phones and the speakerphone works nice and clear. Lot of good "stuff" on it. Of course, service and shipping were great.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Excelent phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is nice, it looks modern, and has very good quality. The only disadvantage is that the answering funtion hasn't enough volume, it's hardly to hear the messages.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. The phone is packed with features. The purchase I made was for the refurbished model, but I have had no issues. Lots of value for the money and delivery was fast. I do recommend and would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: pplafond1

customer_reviews.title: A great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, if the power goes out you don't lose anything. It's the best cordless phone I have ever used. My garage is 100 feet from the house and the phone works very well there.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Tornes

customer_reviews.title: Worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: The phones are great. Received well packaged and on time specified. Did not rate battery life only because I don't know that yet.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: WERE good phones
customer_reviews.text: Looks like after two years its time to replace these phones. I guess you can say they had a good run; the speaking Caller ID is fantastical - yes, fantastical - but they did stop keepin charging about half a year ago. Kinda wish they wouldve lasted longer considering they're not exactly the cheapest of phones.
customer_reviews.author: ShanDeezy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This cordless phone system looks great and works like a charm. The big bright display is very nice and also the backlit keypad is very useful in dark. The connectivity between the handsets is very clear. Voice quality is very good. However, I'd prefer a better speaker volume. This is not a deal breaker though. The setup is simple and easy. Im impressed with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dileep Varma Penmetsa

customer_reviews.title: Great phones.
customer_reviews.text: Great phones. It announces the caller ID between rings. I can hear better with these phones than any I've used.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mims

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This phone is everything it was advertised to be. Stayed charged for long periods and has good audio. It has many features including "Call Block" for unwanted calls..which not many others offer. It is small, light and compact....I am extremely please with my purchase and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A. Backstrom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone set as a gift for my parents and they love it! The announcement feature is really neat; something that the entire family really enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: chefsteph

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great. It's my second Panasonic phone and I love it. Works great, no problems so far. I especially like the Voice Caller I.D. You can type in pretty much anything (limited number of letters) for any number saved Voice I.D. and that's what the phone will attempt to say when they call. Kinda funny! I haven't had the phone long enough to rate the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: David Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Good phone good value
customer_reviews.text: We like this phone. We like the fact that it has a built in answering machine. My wife says she has a little trouble hearing the party on the other end. Not a problem for me. We got a good deal on this through Amazon. We shopped for and found this identical phone at Best Buy. We bought it on Amazon for less money (including shipping) than Best Buy was asking for it. We are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great phones and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these phones four years ago and still using them. Great phones and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gong

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phones
customer_reviews.text: I have this set of Panasonic Phones, they are the best i've had, and I have had a few, without going into all the goodies details, I would recomend you to try these phones from Amazon, thanks.Drew Henderson
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: great phone set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone set as a replacement and am very satisfied. They are very nice looking phones, navigation is simple, audio quality is wonderful, and the battery is awesome. I don't think you can go wrong with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: 610madison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The numbers are large and easy to read. The sound quality is excellent. It has all the features I was looking for. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: robbin burrows

customer_reviews.title: Favorable
customer_reviews.text: This purchase of two phones was to supplement Panasonic cordless phones purchased last year. It was less expensive to do this instead of buying additional phones individually from Panasonic. The phones work fine. The only drawback is that they do not function as intercoms with the original set.
customer_reviews.author: Salty 47

customer_reviews.title: Great and fun phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the extra features, especially the Silent Mode, since my husband has to sleep during the day. It is very helpful that the phone even announces who is calling. The handset is easy to use, big numbers and was a definite upgrade from the previous phone I had
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Weston

customer_reviews.title: Love This Phone!
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot of different phones but always came back to this one. I love the talking caller id and the ability to set the time for silent mode at night. The sound and battery life are fantastic too. The large screen is another plus. I would highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: after extensively searching for the right "home phone", i chose the panasonic and am thrilled with its sound quality and performance. would highly recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Conte

customer_reviews.title: Good Phones
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for some time now and am quite plesed with them. The message waiting feature could use an audible alert to let you know when you have one waitring.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Park

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my Dad.
customer_reviews.text: I got these phones for my dad who has sever hearing loss. He can actually hear these ring and can hear clearly with these. We are happy that we found these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Alyssa Oneal

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is only the second cordless phone I have ever have to purchase so I consider myself very lucky. It was simple to set up and use right away after the initial charging period. It has alot of good features, but the most important thing, the sound quality is excellent! I like having two handsets for the convenience, and the answering machine was an added bonus. I highly recommend this phone system. About the only improvement I would like is to have a bit more weight to the handset, but I suppose others would disagree. You will not be disaapointed if you purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: LKMendel

customer_reviews.title: Phone has 1 big  problem
customer_reviews.text: This Phone is easy to set up and at the beginning,Great. Then I got "cannot connect to base" Looked at instructions,Panasonic has a separate flowchart Just for this problem. "Hint Hint" Reconnected base power-worked 1hr later same thing,30min later same thing on second phone,this continued throughout the day,One time per instructions had to remove batteries and replace them..problem happened again 2hrs this time. No warning when this happens,You only know when you look at antenna symbol that phone is inoperable. Do not trust this phone-returned phone the next day Ordered Panasonic corded/cordless phone,KX-TG1062M. Base is corded and works in power outages and does not have the "cannot connect to base problems". Has almost all features of this phone..Good alternative
customer_reviews.author: kysmet

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone I have no complaints whatsoever...it does what its suppose to do and that is when it rings you pickup the phone and its clear with clear reception
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: First cordless phones - glad I purchased two - would buy again - would recommend very happy with the features
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Consumer friendly
customer_reviews.text: I really am happy with this phone. Its very easy to use and figure out. The belt clips are nice. Answering machine works great, I especially like the fact that on the second handset on the screen it tells you when you have missed calls and messages. Im very happy with Panasonic. I used to work in the phones section at circuit city and panasonic was always the best. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Margareci

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great. I have always used Uniden cordless phones. After years of use, they both stopped working. I was worried that I'd never find another phone that was as good as my old ones. This phone works great. Big display numbers on the phone. Great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. davies

customer_reviews.title: phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone has performed well, with the exception of your voice echo on the handset.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE THIS PHONE
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone - especially like the 'call blocker' and 'announcing' features. Only thing I can suggest is to enable a louder volume.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Great/Easy customer service
customer_reviews.text: Needed to return an item (not defective at all), and they were very easy to work with! More and more important these days!
customer_reviews.author: Prity

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: No trouble at all, very reliable, many features. And yes, it does have call waiting! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ZKnight

customer_reviews.title: Its a great phone
customer_reviews.text: All features are well designed and work perfect! Very easy to setup and the feature that tells who is calling is great. I have only had the phone a few weeks and so far I would say a great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: T. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the phone. It has lived up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C. Kotsay

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: out standing phone,i love that it tell you who is calling you..long battery life and i like the AAA battery...
customer_reviews.author: John  Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Overrated!
customer_reviews.text: While the phone has excellent sound quality, the feature set and ease-of-use are very disappointing for the following reasons: 1) The menu navigation feels like something from 1995. It's clunky, very unintuitive and the display, though large, is very low-res and looks cheap. 2) The phone itself is boxy and feels cheap. 3) Location of the headphone jack is very inconveniently placed on the lower-mid left side, making it difficult to hold and dial when you are using the headphones. 4) The keys are not easy to press. Again, feels cheap. My wife has an Uniden and it's a great phone (I got this one so that we wouldn't mix up our phones)...wish I had gotten that instead.
customer_reviews.author: DLosangeles

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Very Flimsy - Expected better quality from panasonic
customer_reviews.text: Expected a better product from Panasonic .. Although the image on the webpages looks classy and good .. It very cheap and flimsy unlike the other panasonic phones I have seen before. Its made out of cheap sub-standard plastic .. looks like a toy phone from Toys 'R' Us .. Mabbe they are cost cutting to compete in the same price space as V-Tech and Uniden !!
customer_reviews.author: S. Harikrishna

customer_reviews.title: It looks prettier in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the phone was smaller and prettier. When I saw the picture of it I loved it, but when I received it, it was not what I expected, even my husband told me the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Lena

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone System
customer_reviews.text: For those still using a land line, this is about as good as it gets
customer_reviews.author: M. Kellar

product_meta.title: Panasonic Dect 6.0 Black Cordless Phone with Answering Machine and ChoiceMail (KX-TG7432B)
product_meta.description:
Panasonic KX-TG7432B Dect 6.0 Cordless Phone with Answering Machine and ChoiceMail

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer At Panasonic, we never stop trying to increase our knowledge of the ways in which technology can improve people's lives. That's why we've engineered our latest line of DECT 6.0 digital telephones with even more innovative features that enhance the way you communicate. Designed to complement your lifestyle and improve the way you live, our 2009 line features big button handsets and larger, clearer displays in sleek, simple packages. 





 Long Range, Excellent Clarity and Greater Security
DECT 6.0 (Digital Enhanced Cordless Telecommunications) technology lets you move freely around your home with long range and amazingly clear sound. It also assures greater protection against eavesdropping for all your calls. Operating in the 1.9GHz frequency range, your phone will not conflict with other wireless devices such as computer routers, wireless keyboards, microwave ovens and other common household devices.

 Put a Handset in Every Room
With two handsets (one base and one satellite handset) and the option of adding up to four additional handsets — all while using only one base and one phone jack — go ahead and put one in the den, the kitchen, the master bedroom and the living room so you won't have to make a run for it when the phone rings.

 Silent Mode Lets You Choose When and Where the Phone Rings 
Now you can program each handset to ring — or not — at your discretion. Before going to sleep, simply set the bedside handset to Silent Mode so that it won't ring in your bedroom. In the meantime, the handset in the den will still ring when that important call comes in without disturbing the person who's sleeping.

 The Phone That Talks 
Now you don't have to be holding the phone to see who's calling. Using text-to-speech technology, the Caller ID information is announced between rings. The phone also boasts a talking alarm clock that will tell you when it's time for lunch, and a talking battery alert that politely tells you when your battery is low with a "Please charge phone" reminder.

 

 Block Unwanted Calls 
Store the Caller ID info of any and all unwanted callers into your phone's Call Block list so that you can eliminate future pesky calls. After the information is stored, those unwanted callers will receive a busy signal when they call you again.

 

 Never Miss a Call with the Light-Up Indicator
Don't miss important calls when the ringer is off. The Light-Up Indicator with Ringer Alert at the base of the antenna will flash quickly to show that you have an incoming call, and it will flash slowly to let you know you have a new message. So turn off the ringer and never miss a call.

 

 Choice Mail
With Choice Mail, you can quickly view and retrieve a specific recorded message among many. No need to listen to snippets of other messages to get to the one you want. It’s one more way Panasonic designs communication solutions for the way you live.

 

 
1. Additional handsets sold separately. 
2. Requires subscription to name-and-number Caller ID, call waiting and/or voice mail services offered by certain local telephone companies for a fee.



KX-TG7432B includes these additional features:  * Expandable up to six handsets
 * Up to four-way conference capability
 * Large-text display mode
 * Handset locator
 * Handset intercom


What's in the Box
Two cordless handsets, one base, one charger, one telephone cord line, two AC adapters, four batteries, two belt clips, and operating instructions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars112 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
